title: A Reason For Betting
description: “Get all the girls in your lady Lit class.” The wheels in Kate’s mind were spinning, which scared Violet a little. “In fact, why don’t we make a game of it? For every girl in your class that you sleep with in the next two months, I’ll pay..."Young English major Violet has no idea what she’s in for when she and her best friend Kate make a bet – can Violet really sleep with every woman in her literature class in two months? Or will her attraction to one special girl ruin the whole thing?
author: S.B. Sheeran
